pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 外出前にドアにきちんとカギをかけるようにしなさい。
lessons.indonesian: See to it that the door is locked before you leave.

lessons.japanese: モーターがきちんと動かない。
lessons.indonesian: The motor does not function properly.

lessons.japanese: メアリーは宿題を時間通りにきちんとやるべきです。
lessons.indonesian: Mary ought to do her homework on time.

lessons.japanese: すべてきちんと整っている。
